original_text: At that time I, Moses, said this to you: ‘I cannot lead you and help you by myself. It is too difficult for me to do alone.
korean_text: 그 때에 내가 너희에게 말하여 이르기를 나는 홀로 너희의 짐을 질 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: At that time I, Moses, said this to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 나 모세가 너희에게 이렇게 말했다

sentences.original_text: I cannot lead you and help you by myself
sentences.korean_translation: 나 혼자서는 너희를 인도하고 도울 수 없다

sentences.original_text: It is too difficult for me to do alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 나 혼자 하기에는 너무 어렵다
